comment.author: 15313836@N06
comment._content: I think this photo refers to voting at the "Plebiscite" in 1959 whereby the Northern and Southern Cameroons Trust territories under UK administration were separately given the option of either joining the newly independent Republics of Cameroon or Nigeria.

comment.author: 64894760@N07
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/15313836@N06] 
If this picture was taken on the day of the plebiscite, then the date on the label is wrong because it took place in 1961 (on February 11, 1961 to be precise) not 1959! 
If the date they have on the label is correct, then these folks must have been voting for something else (house representatives, maybe?) but, definitely not the plebiscite.
